meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jason Idalski Erin Hoesly Mary Murrell Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6682.

td.p: Jason Idalski, a web producer from Ypsilanti, Michigan
Erin Hoesly, a preschool teacher from Fredericksburg, Virginia
Mary Murrell, an anthropologist from Madison, Wisconsin (whose 1-day cash winnings total $7,100)

tr.td: THE NATIONAL INVENTORS HALL OF FAME
A FEW CHOICE WORDS
FOOD & DRINK
"F"ILM TERMINOLOGY
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with the letter "F".)
EVACUATE!
YOU MUST BE AT LEAST THIS OLD...
(Alex: ...in order to do whatever it is we'll tell you about.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'George Washington Carver

Erin
')
